#set priceDataFrame
```{r}
priceDataFrame = data.frame(day=x, price=xx)
```

#set predictDataFrame
```{r}
predictDataFrame = data.frame(day = y, predic=yy)
```

#merge predictDataFrame and priceDataFrame
```{r}
total = merge(predictDataFrame, priceDataFrame, by="day")
```

# Create Actual predict result and merge to total DataFrame
```{r}
Actual <- (c("nan")) #Set Actual[1] is nan
price <- total[,3]
len <- length(price)

i <- 2

while(i <= len) {
  n = price[i] - price[i-1]

  if(n > 0) {
    Actual = append(Actual, "moving up")
  } else if(n < 0) {
    Actual = append(Actual, "moving down")
  } else {
    Actual =append(Actual, "unchanged")
  }
  i <- i + 1
}

ActualDataFrame = data.frame(day=x,Actual = Actual) # Create Actual DataFrame
total = merge(total, ActualDataFrame, by="day") # merge ActualDataFrame to main DataFrame (total)
```

#test
```{r}
print(total[,2][1])
j <- 2
#length(total[,2]
while(j<=5) {
  if(total[,2][j] == total[,4][j]) {
    print("Y")
  } else {
    print("N")
  }
  j <- j+1
}


```


#Creat excel file
```{r}
write.xlsx(total, file="CVX_merge.xlsx", sheetName="Sheet1", col.names=TRUE, row.names=TRUE, append=FALSE)
```
